# ScopedReadStream.Length property

Gets the length in bytes of the stream. An exception is always thrown.

```csharp
public override long Length { get; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| NotSupportedException | A class derived from stream does not support seeking and the length is unknown. |
